ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Authors gratefully acknowledge the receipt of funding from University of Maryland Baltimore and University of Maryland Baltimore County. The following reagents were deposited by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and obtained through BEI Resources, NIAID, NIH: (i) SARS-Related Coronavirus 2, Isolate USA-WA1/2020, Gamma-Irradiated, NR-52287 and (ii) Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus (MERS CoV), EMC/2012, Irradiated Infected Cell Lysate, NR-50549.
